import { useState } from 'react' import MenuBar from '../components/menu-bar' import './account.css' export default function AccountPage() { const [username, setUsername] = useState('user_00001'), [address, setAddress] = useState('上海闵行'), [phone, setPhone] = useState('12345678901'), [email, setEmail] = useState('@sjtu.deu.en') return (
用户名 setUsername(event.target.value)} />
收货地址 setUsername(event.target.value)} />
电话
邮箱
用户简介
) }
